text: "A Peace Plan for a Safer America" is a gun control plan proposed by March for Our Lives. The plan was unveiled in August 2019. ==Plan== The plan has six points. More than 40 people worked on the plan, collaborating online, over phone, and at a meeting in Houston in July 2019. ==Endorsements== Beto O'Rourke was the first 2020 presidential candidate to endorse the plan. ==References== ==External links== * A Peace Plan for a Safer America at March for Our Lives Category:2019 in American politics Category:Firearm safety
title: A Peace Plan for a Safer America
